Name: walletbeat_grants_staging
Description: EOA owned by polymutex, used exclusively for receiving grant funds prior to multisig being established

Name: polymutex_test1
Description: EOA owned by polymutex, used exclusively for wallet testing (#1). Expect random swaps and transfers to other test accounts.

Name: polymutex_test2
Description: EOA owned by polymutex, used exclusively for wallet testing (#2). Expect random swaps and transfers to other test accounts.

Name: eth:walletbeat_ci_worker
Description: EOA with the private key available to CI/CD pipelines. Holds a small amount of Ether, just enough for CI to update Walletbeat's ENS records. Topped up with funds from treasury as necessary.

Name: fil:walletbeat_ci_worker
Description: EOA with the private key available to CI/CD pipelines. Holds a small amount of FIL and USDfc, used to deploy Walletbeat on IPFS by paying Filecoin storage providers.

Name: teresa5
Description: EOA owned by teresa5 (branding/artist for Walletbeat)

Name: proton1
Description: One-time Bitcoin payment address for Walletbeat Proton mail account
